text: Marimekko is a textile design company. It was started in 1951 in Finland. It is famous for its original prints, for instance, prints of red and blue flowers. The company makes high-quality items, not only furnishing fabrics to tableware but also clothes, bags and other accessories. Its fabrics have been introduced inside the airplanes of Finnair. ==Other websites== * Marimekko | We as a company Category:Fashion houses Category:Companies of Finland Category:1951 establishments in Europe Category:20th-century establishments in Finland
title: Marimekko
